Title: Requires small businesses to have and maintain a first aid kit on the premises of the business at all times
Summary: Requires small businesses to have and maintain a first aid kit on the premises of the business at all times and to store such kits in an accessible location and to make such kits available for use by any person who enters the premises of the business.
LawCode: Add §476, Lab L; amd §201, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law and the public health law, in relation to requiring small businesses to have and maintain a first aid kit on the premises of the business at all times
